word:
EACH PAGE IN THIS NARRATIVE PROVIDES INSIGHTS INTO
9
10
HISTORY RARELY ATTEMPTED BY ANY AUTHOR EXCEPT BY THE WRITERS OF THE HOLY SCRIPTURES. THE STORY OF REDEMPTION IS A TRUE WAR STORY--THE STORY OF GOD AND DEMONS AND MAN IN CONFLICT. IT CULMINATES IN A TRIUMPHANT DENOUEMENT, WITH PEACE AND RESTORATION FOR ALL WHO FOLLOW JESUS CHRIST, THE KING OF KINGS, WHO RETURNS TO EARTH TRIUMPHANTLY.
